name: near
trans: adj. 近的；亲近的；近似的

sentences.english: They live near London.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在伦敦附近。

sentences.english: I’m sure they live somewhere near here.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他们就住在这附近。

sentences.english: They moved house to be nearer the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们把家搬到离学校近一些。

sentences.english: She told the children not to go near the canal.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉孩子们不要走近运河。

sentences.english: I’m warning you - don’t come any nearer!
sentences.chinese: 我警告你别再靠近！

sentences.english: We heard voices as we drew near the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们走近村子时听见了说话声。

detailed_translations.english: only a short distance from a person or thing
only a short distance away from someone or something

sentences.english: We were driving along Follyfoot Road.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着福莱福特路行驶。

sentences.english: She glanced anxiously along the line of faces.
sentences.chinese: 她焦急地扫视着这一排面孔。

sentences.english: He slid his hand along her arm.
sentences.chinese: 他的手顺着她的臂膀滑下。

sentences.english: I was driving along, thinking about Chris.
sentences.chinese: 我一边开车，一边想着克里斯。

detailed_translations.english: from one place on something such as a line, road, or edge towards the other end of it
going forward
very

name: kilometre
trans: n. [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米

sentences.english: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨袭来时他离家有一公里远。

sentences.english: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们就向大道跑去，到了以后再跑了一千米，直到碰到救护车。

sentences.english: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这个光环每立方公里含有约20颗尘埃微粒，结构非常稀薄，站在光环内部都看不见它本身。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,000 metres

sentences.english: She's running the 1,500 metres here.
sentences.chinese: 她正在这儿跑1500米。

sentences.english: A man came to read the electricity metre .
sentences.chinese: 有个男的来抄电表。

detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring length in the  metric system

sentences.english: It’s usually available in hardware stores and Chinatown.
sentences.chinese: 它通常在五金商店和唐人街可以买到。

sentences.english: Vancouver has the biggest Chinatown in Canada, boasting a history of more than a century.
sentences.chinese: 温哥华有加拿大最大的唐人街，已经有超过一个世纪的历史。

sentences.english: They then sell the phones to middlemen, usually at electronics stores in Chinatown, for about $750.
sentences.chinese: 把货卖给在唐人街开手机店的中间人，他们能拿回大约750美元。

detailed_translations.english: an area in a city where there are Chinese restaurants and shops, and where a lot of Chinese people live

name: town
trans: n. 城镇，市镇；市内商业区

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

name: subject
trans: n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民
adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

sentences.english: I’ve looked everywhere but I can’t find the map.
sentences.chinese: 我到处都找过了，但就是找不到地图。

sentences.english: He’s travelled everywhere in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他走遍了欧洲各地。

sentences.english: The south should remain dry, but everywhere else will have heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 南部持续干旱，但其他地区会下暴雨。

detailed_translations.english: in or to every place

name: spoke
trans: n. （车轮的）辐条；轮辐；破坏某人的计划；阻挠某人的行动；刹车；扶梯棍
v. 说话（speak的过去式）；为…装轮辐；说；演说；从某种观点来说

name: lion dance
trans: n. 【文】舞狮；表演者装扮成狮子的样子；每逢节日庆典都会舞狮助兴

sentences.english: the family tomb
sentences.chinese: 家族坟墓

detailed_translations.english: a stone structure above or below the ground where a dead person is buried

name: when
trans: conj. 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
n. 时间，时候；日期；场合
adv. 什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.english: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.english: When will the work be finished?
sentences.chinese: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.english: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

name: stamp
trans: n. 邮票；印记；标志；跺脚
vt. 铭记；标出；盖章于…；贴邮票于…；用脚踩踏

sentences.english: a 29-cent stamp
sentences.chinese: 一枚 29 美分的邮票

sentences.english: Richard collects stamps.
sentences.chinese: 理查德集邮。

sentences.english: a second-class stamp
sentences.chinese: 一张二类邮件的邮票

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper that you buy and stick onto an envelope or package before posting it

detailed_translations.chinese: 铭记；标出；盖章于…；贴邮票于…；用脚踩踏
detailed_translations.english: to put your foot down onto the ground loudly and with a lot of force

name: book
trans: n. 书籍；卷；帐簿；名册；工作簿

sentences.english: I’ve just started reading a book by Graham Greene.
sentences.chinese: 我刚开始看格雷厄姆·格林写的一本书。

sentences.english: a cookery book
sentences.chinese: 烹饪书

sentences.english: Have you booked a holiday this year?
sentences.chinese: 你今年有没有预订去度假？

detailed_translations.english: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them
to make arrangements to stay in a place, eat in a restaurant, go to a theatre etc at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.english: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.english: We’ve been out collecting signatures for our petition.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

detailed_translations.english: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

sentences.english: What are your hobbies?
sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

name: island
trans: n. 岛；岛屿；安全岛；岛状物

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: large tropical gardens of coconut palms
sentences.chinese: 大型热带椰树园

detailed_translations.english: the large brown seed of a tropical tree, which has a hard shell containing white flesh that you can eat and a milky liquid that you can drink

sentences.english: He said sometimes they would invite some friends to share the happiness of Thanksgiving Day.
sentences.chinese: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.english: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.chinese: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.english: It compares with "Cyber Monday" in the US - the day after Thanksgiving marketed as a big online shopping day.
sentences.chinese: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

detailed_translations.english: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc

name: nearly
trans: adv. 差不多，几乎；密切地

sentences.english: It took nearly two hours to get here.
sentences.chinese: 到这里花了将近两小时。

sentences.english: Michelle’s nearly twenty.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔年近二十。

sentences.english: Is the job nearly finished?
sentences.chinese: 这工作快干完了吗？

sentences.english: Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
sentences.chinese: 路易丝差不多和她母亲一样高。

sentences.english: I nearly always go home for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎总是回家吃午饭。

sentences.english: He very nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 他差点送命。

detailed_translations.english: almost, but not quite or not completely

name: sure
trans: adj. 确信的；可靠的；必定的

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

detailed_translations.english: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct
used to say ‘yes’ to someone

sentences.english: In the dark of December.
sentences.chinese: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.english: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.chinese: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.english: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.chinese: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

detailed_translations.english: the 12th month of the year, between November and January

name: light
trans: n. 光；光线；灯；打火机；领悟；浅色；天窗
adj. 轻的；浅色的；明亮的；轻松的；容易的；清淡的
adv. 轻地；清楚地；轻便地

sentences.english: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.english: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.english: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.english: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.chinese: 只受到轻度辐射的人

detailed_translations.english: not very heavy

name: pleased
trans: adj. 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
v. 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: Your Dad will be so pleased.
sentences.chinese: 你爸爸会非常高兴的。

sentences.english: She seemed pleased by the compliment.
sentences.chinese: 她受了赞扬，显得很高兴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
detailed_translations.english: happy or satisfied

detailed_translations.chinese: 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

name: pretty
trans: n. 有吸引力的事物（尤指饰品）；漂亮的人
adj. 漂亮的；可爱的；优美的

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

name: French
trans: adj. 法国的；法语的；法国人的

sentences.english: an excellent French wine
sentences.chinese: 上等的法国葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: relating to France, its people, or its language
people from France

sentences.english: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.english: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.chinese: 谁来的电话？

sentences.english: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.chinese: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone

name: world
trans: n. 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

name: difficult
trans: adj. 困难的；不随和的；执拗的

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

name: Miss
trans: n. 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子

sentences.english: It was nice talking to you, Miss Ellis.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴与你交谈，埃利斯小姐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子
detailed_translations.english: You use Miss in front of the name of a girl or unmarried woman when you are speaking to her or referring to her

name: bamboo
trans: adj. 竹制的；土著居民的

sentences.english: Everything there is made of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 那里什么都是竹子做的。

sentences.english: Do you like bamboo?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢竹子吗?

detailed_translations.english: a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture

sentences.english: He emphasized its importance to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我强调它的重要性。

sentences.english: The child read the story but did not comprehend its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子读了这篇故事，但不能理解它的意思。

sentences.english: The company disseminated information about its new programmes.
sentences.chinese: 公司传播有关其新计划的信息。

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

sentences.english: communication between deaf and hearing people
sentences.chinese: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.english: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.english: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.chinese: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

sentences.english: She was deaf to his pleas.
sentences.chinese: 她对他的恳求充耳不闻。

detailed_translations.english: physically unable to hear anything or unable to hear well

name: frightened
trans: v. 害怕；使吃惊；吓走（frighten的过去分词）
adj. 害怕的；受惊的；受恐吓的

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened. We’re not going to hurt you.
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，我们不会伤害你的。

sentences.english: To tell the truth, I was frightened to death (= very frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 说实话，我怕得要命。

sentences.english: a frightened horse
sentences.chinese: 一匹受惊的马

detailed_translations.chinese: 害怕的；受惊的；受恐吓的
detailed_translations.english: feeling afraid

detailed_translations.chinese: 害怕；使吃惊；吓走（frighten的过去分词）

sentences.english: We heard a lion roar.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到狮子在吼叫。

sentences.english: The engines roared.
sentences.chinese: 引擎轰鸣。

sentences.english: ‘Get out of my house!’ he roared.
sentences.chinese: “从我家里滚出去！”他吼道。

sentences.english: the roar of the crowd
sentences.chinese: 人群的喊叫声

detailed_translations.english: to make a deep, very loud noise
a deep, loud noise made by an animal such as a lion, or by someone’s voice

sentences.english: We were foxed by the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们被这个问题难住了。

detailed_translations.english: to confuse or deceive someone in a clever way
a wild animal like a dog with reddish-brown fur, a pointed face, and a thick tail

name: coin
trans: vt. 铸造（货币）；杜撰，创造

sentences.english: Toss a coin to see who goes first.
sentences.chinese: 抛硬币决定谁先来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal, usually flat and round, that is used as money
to make pieces of money from metal

sentences.english: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 你去过巴黎吗？

sentences.english: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.english: It was raining harder than ever.
sentences.chinese: 当时下着前所未有的大雨。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

name: messy
trans: adj. 凌乱的，散乱的；肮脏的，污秽的；麻烦的

sentences.english: a messy room
sentences.chinese: 凌乱的房间

sentences.english: Sorry the place is so messy, I haven’t had time to clear up.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，这地方又脏又乱，我一直没时间打扫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱的，散乱的；肮脏的，污秽的；麻烦的
detailed_translations.english: dirty or untidy

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔在黑板上勾划出一个图样。

sentences.english: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.chinese: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.english: The teacher knocked on the blackboard to catch our attention.
sentences.chinese: 老师敲了敲黑板以引起我们的注意。

detailed_translations.english: a board with a dark smooth surface, used in schools for writing on with  chalk

name: peace
trans: n. 和平；平静；和睦；秩序

sentences.english: The country is at peace with its neighbours for the first time in years.
sentences.chinese: 这是多年来该国与其邻国第一次和平共处。

sentences.english: By the end of the century, France had made peace with Britain.
sentences.chinese: 到那个世纪末，法国和英国议和了。

sentences.english: a city where people of different religions have lived together in peace for centuries
sentences.chinese: 不同宗教的人们和平共处数百年的城市

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 为该地区争取和平的努力

sentences.english: a dangerous situation which threatens world peace
sentences.chinese: 威胁世界和平的危险状况

sentences.english: An uneasy peace continued until 1939.
sentences.chinese: 不稳定的和平局面维持到1939年。

sentences.english: the Northern Ireland peace talks
sentences.chinese: 北爱尔兰和平会谈

sentences.english: an international peace conference
sentences.chinese: 国际和平大会

sentences.english: the peace treaty that ended the First World War
sentences.chinese: 终结第一次世界大战的和平条约

sentences.english: the Middle East peace process
sentences.chinese: 中东和平进程

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is no war or fighting

name: famous
trans: adj. 著名的；极好的，非常令人满意的

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

name: aunt
trans: n. 阿姨；姑妈；伯母；舅妈

sentences.english: Aunt Mary
sentences.chinese: 玛丽姑妈

detailed_translations.english: the sister of your father or mother, or the wife of your father’s or mother’s brother

name: forgot
trans: v. 忘记；轻忽；遗漏（forget的过去式）

name: way
trans: n. 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

name: cross
trans: n. 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
adj. 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的

sentences.english: The by-pass crosses Wilton Lane shortly after a roundabout.
sentences.chinese: 这条旁道绕过环岛后不久就和威尔顿巷相交。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
detailed_translations.english: an upright post of wood with another crossing it near the top, that people in the past were fastened to with nails and left to die on as a punishment
if two or more roads, lines, etc cross, or if one crosses another, they go across each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的
detailed_translations.english: angry or annoyed
